Author: Dalos_
Text: It’s really a lot to handle. Even if it’s a ‘positive’ comment to them, it can affect us and others so differently than intended. It can make us feel like we HAVE to be thin, or whatever, and in general weight talk should just be unacceptable. There’s really just no need for it. And I feel bad for your sister too, especially since you both are suffering right now. That couldn’t have been easy on her to hear.
